channel.title: Old Generic Moparscape?
channel.description:
i think moparscape has too many forums now with the default smf theme. who here would like to see something new? I'd say mabey edit the default theme into a green camo color or something. For crying out loud why haven't there been any changes? It's yet another generic moparscape brand forum. (not raging or anything, quite to the contrary).
So who would like to see some changes to this forum?

item.title: Old Generic Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

why is it on mscp id rather it here

Read full topic

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

item.title: Old Generic Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:12, topic:392556”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=489728.msg3580733#msg3580733 date=1303774028]

that’s not my point, my point is why are they all rc2 and why is this a basic blank smf forum?

Look, we all went over this on the IRC. Is there anything else left to be said? (rc2 etc). To spare everyone the time I’ll sum up his argument.

Many people get hacked every day because we use rc2, Jagex get past the TOS by hacking smf and don’t accept it.
[/quote]
You are being sarcastic right? I surely hope so.[/quote]

Well yeah…

Also, I have nothing against the current theme (I use curve). But I think it would be a nice for a change and that theme does look really nice which cocoa posted.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Generic Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

The odds of people complaining about a theme are minimal in reality. As long as the theme is simple and sleek im fine with it. Gives the forum some umph anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Old Generic Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell

@Frell wrote:

you know how many people just dont care and never bother to change it?

Read full topic

item.title: Old Generic Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Maybe you should post a topic/poll about it on moparisthebest.com or here to see how many want it. It’s just a lot of work to support another theme for only a handful of people. For example, the other theme that is currently installed is used by 116 people, while the default theme is used by 476199 people (everyone else). As you can see, that’s pretty much a failure and a waste of time.

Read full topic

item.title: Old Generic Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:9, topic:392556”][quote author=rant link=topic=489728.msg3580567#msg3580567 date=1303765844]
that’s not my point, my point is why are they all rc2 and why is this a basic blank smf forum?
[/quote]

Look, we all went over this on the IRC. Is there anything else left to be said? (rc2 etc). To spare everyone the time I’ll sum up his argument.

Many people get hacked every day because we use rc2, Jagex get past the TOS by hacking smf and don’t accept it.[/quote]

You are being sarcastic right? I surely hope so.

Also I don’t think that ‘rant’ knows this is just the default SMF theme, and most people here like it. As I said, if enough people want another theme, I’ll install it.

that’s not my point, my point is why are they all rc2 and why is this a basic blank smf forum?

Look, we all went over this on the IRC. Is there anything else left to be said? (rc2 etc). To spare everyone the time I’ll sum up his argument.

Many people get hacked every day because we use rc2, Jagex get past the TOS by hacking smf and don’t accept it.

I LOVE THIS THEME. MITB, at least give us one that resembles vBulletin
